executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Use correct prefixes (/auth, /organizations, /teams, /projects, /features, /issues).
Registration requires: email, password, first_name, last_name.
Login requires form-data: username, password.
Issue status: backlog, todo, in_progress, done, cancelled.
Feature status: discovery, validated, in_build, in_review, shipped, adopted, killed.
Use unique identifiers for teams. Note that creating an organization automatically creates a default team.
Create organization, then team, then project, then feature, then issue in sequence for dependency resolution.
Each test case should use unique email/names to avoid conflicts.
Team identifier must be max 5 chars.
If team identifier exists, try a different one.
